Description: Papyrus; Demotic administrative text recto and verso. Template for drawing up demotic marriage (recto) and exchange (verso). One mentions "pieces of the Treasury of Ptah". One is part of model contract of EA 10648.
Curator's comments: Part of the same model contract as EA 10648. Bibliography: C.J. Martin, 'Another Legal Template from Tebtynis: P. BM EA 10643', in F. Haikal (ed.), Melanges offerts a Ola el-Aguizy (BdE 164; Cairo, 2015), 277-302.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380682) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380682)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: insect attack, fractured, stained Black ink Tabbed: silk Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: incomplete/fragmentary
